WRITING.TITLE: "Hey Jackass"
WRITING.TEXT:
A guy goes up to the bar and has a drink. A few moments later another guy comes up and says to the bartender "hey jackass, get me a beer!" The bartender gladly hands the man a beer and continues working.
After a while the same guy approaches the bar and says again "hey jackass, get me another beer!" The bartender again gladly serves the man.
Confused the guy asks the bartender "why do you let him call you that?"
The bartender replies "HE-HAW HE-HAWlways calls me that!"
Someone's boyfriend likes their balls tickled!
Don't wear horizontal lines. It doesn't fit your face. The picture of you in your wedding dress you look lean and good! The horizontal lines take from your length and height.

Yesterday. I went for a run and about halfway my butt hairs started to get knotted up in one another. Then I had the sensation to poo and hurried back home. When I sat down I could feel my hair's being pulled because the hairs tangled up with the ones on the other side. When I pushed, my poop hit those trip wire hairs and pulled them out. Made me actually cry a few tears.
If you're new find a really cheap or second hand set of clubs to get your swing down.

Golf. The alone time and stress relief I get from just going to the driving range to better my shot. You learn to be patient and some courses have beautiful views. Also you can have some drinks while playing.
Have you guys watched Amy Schumer's new stand up?! It's hilarious!

Any game that has the random rewards for playing online such as Battlefield battle packs, or REQ packs in Halo 5. It makes it pointless when I used to work hard and have some sweet armor for my Spartan but now some low level could have the same as you. Spartan armor used to mean something.
Sloppy Joe's and Lay's original potato chips.
"Just because you're in a relationship doesn't me you stop being an idividual." -Mr. Meeseeks

They didn't kill golf. Once they grow old and start to realize how annoying the world is they can try golf. I wasn't a fan when I was younger but just got fully into it this year. Some courses are absolutely stunning and it's relaxing to take your time.
Just walking away and not giving them the time. Plus you look super cool walking away not looking back at the bridge you just burned.

Reposting. It's like that one friend that has to tell the same story every time. Anytime I see something I've seen before, I down vote it. I just never understand how the same thing will keep getting to the front page.
Evolve. Sold it the day after purchasing.

I work third shift and when I come in early I help second shift clean up at the end of their shift. I'll sweep stuff into a pile 5-10 feet away from the trash. Then when one of them brings a shovel to pick it up I'll sweep so they have to stand under a conveyor and bent over while I take my time only to have them move again.
